programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: To collect on a 30-year-old gambling debt, a gangster named Sonny threatens to pay Uncle Patrick a visit in Saint Victoire; to save Patrick, Jean must solve a riddle and unlock a rare treasure.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Jean and Dom investigate when a puppeteer is murdered after a Christmas Eve performance at a Sainte Victoire market; Judith receives a card from a former bridesmaid that contains a disturbing truth about her marriage.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Jean and Dom investigate when a puppeteer is murdered after a Christmas Eve performance at a Sainte Victoire market; Judith receives a card from a former bridesmaid that contains a disturbing truth about her marriage.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Following her husband's death, Jean White arrives in Sainte Victoire to prepare to sell her cottage.

programme.title: The Madame Blanc Mysteries
programme.desc: Jean learns from police chief Caron that her ring has been sent away as evidence, and that there is little they can do about the threats from Rory's mistress.

programme.title: Hidden Assets
programme.desc: An Irish detective stumbles upon some valuables that might be connected to a terrorist plot.

programme.title: Hidden Assets
programme.desc: With the discovery that another bombing is imminent, Emer and Christian's attention is drawn to a well-known Irish businessman with a very chequered past.

programme.title: Hidden Assets
programme.desc: Rough diamonds are found in Fionn's offices; Emer links this evidence to the bombings and warns Fionn that his life is in danger; Christian discovers that one of Sana's friends has been beaten by a fellow officer.

programme.title: Hidden Assets
programme.desc: As the search for Fionn begins, Christian suggests that Fionn's frequent travels to Surat, India, may point to a diamond connection.

programme.title: Hidden Assets
programme.desc: While her team follows the money trail in Ireland, Emer and Christian discover the real identity of the bombers; a very unexpected source provides the investigation with invaluable information.

programme.title: Hidden Assets
programme.desc: With someone now in custody, Emer and Christian face a desperate race against time to stop the final bombing and uncover who was really behind the terrorist campaign.

programme.title: Hidden Assets
programme.desc: A year after the bombings, Trestford boss Richard Melnick dies in Antwerp, and CTU's Christian de Jong remains under investigation for shooting Luca Rivera; in Ireland, Bibi Brannigan makes an offer to CAB, now led by DS Claire Wallace.

programme.title: Hidden Assets
programme.desc: Bibi reveals that Richard orchestrated the bombings as a ploy to get Deputy PM Viktor Maes into power and buy the Antwerp port; using her statement, CTU draw a link to additional operatives, but Bibi has even more shocking intel to share.

programme.title: Hidden Assets
programme.desc: Maes intercedes with the mayor to help Frances Swann, Trestford's new head, but backs out when a journalist approaches Swann's rival about the port deal; CTU learns Richard's cause of death, and Bibi lands in the crosshairs of an assassin.

programme.title: Hidden Assets
programme.desc: On Claire's orders, Bibi contacts her money launderer to set up a meeting in Antwerp, as Christian prepares to search Richard's apartment and offices; the mole within CTU works to sabotage their plans at every step.

programme.title: Hidden Assets
programme.desc: Under pressure from her criminal backers, Swann threatens Maes to ensure the port sale proceeds, even as she begins to question who's behind it all; Christian is furious when Claire tells him about the mole, and Bibi's husband and son are targeted.

programme.title: Hidden Assets
programme.desc: After a tragedy, CAB's investigation stalls, but Bibi shares with Claire the contents of Richard's will, listing a connection to the bomb warehouse; a CTU raid yields evidence against a key player, but the real mastermind might not be unmasked.

programme.title: Signora Volpe
programme.desc: Spy Sylvia Fox travels to Italy for the wedding of her niece.

programme.title: Signora Volpe
programme.desc: As her new home undergoes renovation, Sylvia helps an old university friend at her archaeological dig, where Sylvia unearths a skeleton buried in a shallow grave.
